trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para controles que derivam de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação que descreve um controle que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o código de controle de tempo de design é persistente para a origem da marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Designers that are derived from the BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Designers que são derivados da classe base abstrata de BaseDataBoundControlDesigner fornecem suporte de tempo de design para controles que são derivados da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> de

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância de um designer que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>classe quando ele cria o controle associado na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, normalmente desengancha eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexa novos eventos para a nova fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the ConnectToDataSource method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do método ConnectToDataSource normalmente envolve remover eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexar novos eventos para a nova fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the old and new data sources are the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma conexão para uma nova fonte de dados foi realizada, normalmente; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se as fontes de dados novos e antigos são os mesmos.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cria uma nova fonte de dados associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa as ações necessárias para configurar o controle associado que deriva de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you override the DataBind method in a designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly.
trans-unit.target: Quando você substituir o método DataBind em um designer que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>classe, execute as ações necessárias para configurar o controle associado a dados, de modo que quando a marcação de tempo de design é recuperada, o controle é renderizado corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você associará uma fonte de dados de tempo de design em vez de fonte de dados ao vivo, por motivos de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> with which this designer is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> à qual este designer está associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*> property for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>propriedade para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property is used to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataSource é usado para sombra o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe que está associado este designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the DataSource property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade DataSource é mantido pelo designer como uma expressão de associação de dados na marca que é gerada para subjacente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A expressão de associação de dados usada pelo controle associado derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property of the underlying <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>propriedade subjacente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceID property is used to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataSourceID é usada para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade subjacente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> associated with the underlying <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A ID do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> associado subjacente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, unhooks events from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, desengancha eventos da fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"></xref> object, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner"> </xref> objeto e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose desvincula os manipuladores de eventos para o designer de todos os eventos de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>classe recupera dados de exemplo que são usados para fins de associação em tempo de design antes de processar o controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not data bound, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle não está associado a dados, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um erro ao processar o controle, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design se o controle está vazio ou se a fonte de dados não pode ser recuperada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>classe recupera dados de exemplo que são usados para fins de associação em tempo de design antes de processar o controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.
trans-unit.target: O controle de tempo de design vazio é renderizada como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo e o nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.
trans-unit.target: A marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design com uma fonte de dados vazio.

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design quando ocorreu um erro.

trans-unit.source: The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.
trans-unit.target: O controle de tempo de design de erro é renderizada como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo, o nome do controle e uma mensagem que descreve o erro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que foi lançada.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: A marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design quando ocorreu um erro.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar um controle que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> de

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e conectar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref>, which implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref>, que implementa <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> alterações do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method connects to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataSourceChanged conecta-se à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados atual é diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado anteriormente, ou `forceUpdateView` é `true`, o controle associado é redesenhado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para forçar a atualização de marcação de tempo de design; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"></xref> object loads a new schema.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl"> </xref> objeto carrega um novo esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método trata o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>evento, que é gerado quando o esquema dos dados de origem para que o controle associado está associado é alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método para executar ações adicionais que são necessárias quando o novo esquema está disponível.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para exibição no **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class, the PreFilterProperties shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>classe sombras PreFilterProperties o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: It makes a copy of the attribute array of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property.
trans-unit.target: Ele faz uma cópia da matriz de atributo de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>e, em seguida, adiciona esses atributos para a propriedade sombreada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute of the shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property to `false` unless the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property of the control is already set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>atributo do sombreado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>propriedade `false` , a menos que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade do controle já está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the properties to filter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém as propriedades para filtrar.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], displays a dialog box to assist the user in creating a data source.
trans-unit.target: Em um host de design, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], exibe uma caixa de diálogo para ajudar o usuário a criar uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A reference to this designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The type of data source.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable editing of the configuration, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to disable configuration editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para permitir a edição da configuração, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para desabilitar a configuração de edição.

trans-unit.source: The ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: A ID de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> controle na página.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> object.
